resources.string: CallSat was established in 1999 in Cyprus and is an alternative in the telecommunication sector, a fully developed and integrated licensed provider. In order to provide access to the most developed international telecommunication systems, CallSat offers world-wide connectivity to primary level providers. Whether you are transferring data, IP, voice or video communication, or even a complete package, CallSat is the ideal provider. We offer all the benefits of the latest technology. We have also formed strategic alliances with the leaders in global communication, in order to create a network of high-performance, and deliver optimized products and services to our clients\' advanced needs. Reliability, security and speed are the features that all telecommunication services should provide. These traits are CallSat core values. The highly trained and capable service staff can provide our customers, in addition to cutting-edge technologies and services, with the information and support they need.
